mapper.select: select gc.*, pgc.class_name as parent_class_name from shop_goods_class gc left join shop_goods_class pgc on gc.parent_id = pgc.id where gc.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select gc.* from shop_goods_class gc where gc.level < #{level} and gc.delete_status = 0 and gc.class_name like concat(#{className}, '%')
select gc.* from shop_goods_class gc INNER join shop_goods_spec_gc_detail gsgd on gc.id=gsgd.spec_gc_id where gc.delete_status=0 and gsgd.spec_id=#{specId}
select gc.* from shop_goods_class gc INNER join shop_goods_spec_gc_detail gsgd on gc.id=gsgd.spec_gc_id where gc.delete_status=0 and gsgd.spec_id=#{specId} and gsgd.spec_gc_id=#{classId}
select gc.*,gt.name as goods_type_name from shop_goods_class gc left join shop_goods_type gt on gc.goods_type_id =gt.id where gc.delete_status=0 and gc.parent_id is null order by gc.sequence asc

select gc.*,gt.name as goods_type_name,parent.parent_id as parent_parent_id from shop_goods_class gc left join shop_goods_type gt on gc.goods_type_id =gt.id left join shop_goods_class parent on gc.parent_id =parent.id where gc.delete_status=0 and gc.parent_id =#{parentId} order by gc.sequence asc

select
distinct
from shop_goods_class
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.sql: id, add_time, delete_status, app_icon, class_name, commission_rate, description_evaluate, display, gc_color, guarantee, icon_sys, icon_type, level, recommend, sequence, service_evaluate, ship_evaluate, goods_type_id, icon_acc_id, parent_id, wx_icon, mobile_icon, click_icon, unClick_icon
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from shop_goods_class
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into shop_goods_class (id, add_time, delete_status, app_icon, class_name, commission_rate, description_evaluate, display, gc_color, guarantee, icon_sys, icon_type, level, recommend, sequence, service_evaluate, ship_evaluate, goods_type_id, icon_acc_id, parent_id, wx_icon, mobile_icon, click_icon, unClick_icon, gb_info, gc_advert, seo_description, seo_keywords) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{appIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commissionRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{descriptionEvaluate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{display,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gcColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guarantee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{iconSys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceEvaluate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shipEvaluate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{iconAccId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wxIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unclickIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gbInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{gcAdvert,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{seoDescription,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

update shop_goods_class
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_status = #{record.deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
app_icon = #{record.appIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class_name = #{record.className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commission_rate = #{record.commissionRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
description_evaluate = #{record.descriptionEvaluate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
display = #{record.display,jdbcType=BIT},
gc_color = #{record.gcColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guarantee = #{record.guarantee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
icon_sys = #{record.iconSys,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon_type = #{record.iconType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{record.level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recommend = #{record.recommend,jdbcType=BIT},
sequence = #{record.sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},

ship_evaluate = #{record.shipEvaluate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
goods_type_id = #{record.goodsTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
icon_acc_id = #{record.iconAccId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mobile_icon = #{record.mobileIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
click_icon = #{record.clickIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unClick_icon = #{record.unclickIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

seo_description = #{record.seoDescription,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
seo_keywords = #{record.seoKeywords,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update shop_goods_class set add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, app_icon = #{appIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commission_rate = #{commissionRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, description_evaluate = #{descriptionEvaluate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, display = #{display,jdbcType=BIT}, gc_color = #{gcColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guarantee = #{guarantee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, icon_sys = #{iconSys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon_type = #{iconType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT}, sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, service_evaluate = #{serviceEvaluate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ship_evaluate = #{shipEvaluate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goods_type_id = #{goodsTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, icon_acc_id = #{iconAccId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, wx_icon = #{wxIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_icon = #{mobileIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, click_icon = #{clickIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unClick_icon = #{unclickIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select gc.* from shop_goods_class gc where gc.level = #{level} ORDER BY ID ASC
select name from shop_goods_brand where id = #{id}
